name: Blaeu's 'Lancastria Palatinatvs' (1645/1662)
description: Joan Blaeu's map of Lancashire from the Atlas Maior (1662-5). Dutch golden age cartography based on Saxton and Speed.
notes:
Joan Blaeu, Atlas Maior Vol.5 (England, 1662-5).
Title: 'Lancastria Palatinatvs Vulgo Lancaster'.
Based on earlier Saxton/Speed surveys but beautifully re-engraved.
NLS has complete digitized Atlas Maior.
Full volume listing: https://maps.nls.uk/atlas/blaeu-maior/list.cfm?vol=5
Also listed on NLS Lancashire county maps page.
